periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow then Chance Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow before midnight, then a chance of snow showers between midnight and 2am, then rain and snow showers. Cloudy, with a low around 32. East northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 10am, then snow showers likely and a slight chance of sleet between 10am and noon, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Cloudy, with a high near 36. Northeast wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 7pm, then a chance of rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. Northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 38. Northeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before midnight. Cloudy, with a low around 23. Northwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 31. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 15. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 39. East southeast wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Rain Likely
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33. South southeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 50. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Rain And Snow Likely then Chance Rain And Snow
periods.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely before midnight, then a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 22. North northwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 30. North northwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 13. North northwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
